Aarakocra.Description: A winged people who originated on the Elemental Plane of Air. They have avian features, typically standing about 5 feet tall, with feathers of various colors and long, narrow legs tapering to sharp talons. Their heads resemble those of parrots or eagles.
Aarakocra.Source: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

Options: Increase one score by 2 and a different score by 1
Increase three different scores by 1 each

Speed.Flying: 30 feet (not usable with medium or heavy armor)

Talons.Description: Talons that can be used for unarmed strikes.

Wind Caller.Description: Ability to cast Gust of Wind spell.
Casting: At 3rd level, cast Gust of Wind without material components
Can cast Gust of Wind using spell slots of 2nd level or higher
Wind Caller.Spellcasting Ability: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (choose when selecting race)
Wind Caller.Rest: Can only use this trait once per long rest

Languages.Additional: One other language chosen with DM's agreement
